messages.text: Hi, availability for 12–14 Oct for 2 adults?
Available: Deluxe €180/night. Proceed to book?
Yes, book the Deluxe.
Name and email, please.
John Smith, john@example.com
Payment processed. Booking confirmed.
I need 1 night tonight.
Single Room €120. Proceed?
Yes.
Enter card details to guarantee.
I'll finish later.
I can hold the rate for 15 minutes.
Do you have an airport shuttle?
Yes, the shuttle runs every hour from 6:00 to 22:00. It costs €12 per person.
Where do I catch it at the airport?
Terminal 1, exit B, bay 5. Look for the hotel logo on the sign.
What's your early check-in policy?
Standard check-in is 15:00. Early check-in from 12:00 is subject to room readiness.
Is there a fee?
There's no fee if the room is ready. Otherwise, we can store luggage for free.
Are pets allowed at the hotel?
Yes, small pets up to 10 kg are allowed in designated rooms.
Any restrictions in common areas?
Pets are not allowed in the restaurant or spa. Leashes required in public areas.
Do you have accessible rooms?
We offer accessible rooms with roll-in showers and lowered switches.
Is there step-free access to the lobby?
Yes, the main entrance is step-free and elevators serve all floors.
The Wi‑Fi keeps disconnecting in my room.
Sorry about that. Please try the '5Ghz' network and move closer to the window.
Still unstable.
I’ve opened a ticket for IT and can provide a travel router at the front desk.
Can I get extra towels and pillows to room 412?
Absolutely—two towels and two pillows for room 412. Anything else?
That's all, thanks.
Done. Housekeeping will deliver within 10–15 minutes.
Do you have sea-view rooms this weekend?
Yes: Standard €150, Superior €190 with balcony.
What's the difference?
Superior has a balcony and premium breakfast.
I'll take Superior. Maria, maria@example.com.
Payment complete. You're all set.
The AC is making a loud noise.
Thanks for telling us. I've alerted maintenance; they can come between 14:00–15:00.
14:30 works.
Scheduled for 14:30. We'll follow up after the visit.
I left a black umbrella in the lobby yesterday.
Let me check lost & found. Could you confirm the brand or any distinctive mark?
It's a compact Samsonite with a silver button.
Found it. You can pick it up at the front desk; we can also ship it for a fee.
Can you send me the invoice for my last stay?
Sure—please provide the email address and VAT number.
billing@acme.com, VAT PT123456789
Thanks. I’ll email the invoice within a few minutes.
Any good seafood places within walking distance?
Try Mar Azul (10 min) for grilled fish and O Porto Velho (8 min) for seafood rice.
Do I need a reservation?
Recommended after 19:30. I can share phone numbers if you like.
